info.name: Dark - SteamDB
info.description: Darken up the colors on SteamDB. I tried to use a very basic and minimal pallet, but there are places color shines through.
info.additionalInfo:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 1.22

Fixed graph price info, wishlisted items, and the Linux icon.

Version 1.2

Fixed white background in recent releases.

Version 1.1

Fixed owned games not being a green color.

Version 1.0

Un-inverted the platform icons, because they are now white by default.
